ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR (ISPICKVAL(Are_you__c , "FULLY CAD/CAM OUTSOURCING (Sending scanning and milling work out)"), ISPICKVAL(Are_you__c , "PARTIALLY CAD/CAM OUTSOURCING (Have scanner-sending milling work out)" )), NOT(Primary_Milling_System__c=""))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Primary Milling System field should be blank as your work is not 'FULLY IN HOUSE operation'.
